name: Cavavenchian

specials.name: Plaguesense
specials.description: A leukodaemon senses any creature with a disease, and it knows the type and current stage of all diseases carried by any creature within range.

specials.name: Infectious Aura
specials.description: 30 feet. Leukodaemons radiate infection. All creatures within 30 feet of a leukodaemon take a -2 status penalty to saves against disease effects. If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

specials.name: Breath Weapon
specials.description: The leukodaemon exhales a cloud of corpse-bloated, biting black flies in a 20-foot cone. Creatures within the cone take 5d8 piercing damage (DC 32 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails the save becomes sickened 1 (or sickened 2 on a critical failure).

specials.name: Daemonic Pestilence
specials.description: The leukodaemon can telepathically communicate with the afflicted creature at any distance on the same plane; Saving Throw DC 32 Fortitude; Stage 1 carrier (1 day); Stage 2 drained 1 (1 day); Stage 3 drained 2 (1 day); Stage 4 drained 2 (1 day); Stage 5 drained 3 (1 week); Stage 6 dead

specials.name: Quicken Pestilence
specials.description: The leukodaemon coaxes a disease into full bloom. It chooses a target in its aura of pestilence that's currently affected by a disease. That creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the disease as if the interval for the disease's current stage had passed.

savenote: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

strikes.name: jaws
strikes.damage: 3d10+12 piercing plus 1d8 evil and Daemonic Pestilence

strikes.name: claw
strikes.traits: agile, disease, evil, magical, reach 10 feet
strikes.damage: 3d8+10 slashing plus 1d8 evil and Daemonic Pestilence

strikes.damage: 3d6+12 piercing plus 1d8 evil and Daemonic Pestilence
